dashboard.description: Real-time monitoring and analysis of errors across the Grid Dashboard ecosystem

purpose.title: What this dashboard shows
purpose.description: This dashboard aggregates error data from agent session logs, tool failures, and system exceptions. It helps identify patterns, track system health, and diagnose issues across all OpenClaw agents and components.

helpText.clickDetails: Click any error for detailed view

summary.totalErrorsDesc: Errors detected in the selected time range across all agents and systems
summary.affectedAgentsDesc: Number of different AI agents that encountered errors
summary.errorCategoriesDesc: Different types of errors: tools, messages, exceptions, etc.

filters.description: Narrow down results by agent, error type, or time period
filters.agentHelp: Choose specific agent or leave empty to see all
filters.errorTypeHelp: Tool errors, exceptions, message errors, etc.

points: No tool failures or exceptions detected
